text: Hey guys, I posted on the <#C017Z6Q3WS3|pluto> channel, but got no answers. Does anyone know of any initiative to create a vim-mode for Pluto? It's the only thing that's keeping me from using it. I really like the vim-mode on Jupyter, I was wondering how hard it would be to port it to Pluto. Has anyone taken a look at it?
